item.title: MMM
item.description: score:9 Chances: 3M Co. named aerospace veteran William Brown as its new chief executive officer, bringing in fresh leadership to navigate mounting legal liabilities and a diminished stock price. Risks: 3M Co. is battling lawsuits related to ‘forever chemicals’ and is preparing to spin off its healthcare unit, which could create uncertainty and volatility for investors.
